# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

We pledge to make participation in this community a welcoming experience for everyone. We are committed to acting and interacting in ways that contribute to an open, healthy, and positive community.

## Our Standards

**Examples of positive behavior include:**
* Demonstrating kindness toward others.
* Giving and accepting constructive feedback gracefully.
* Focusing on what is best for the overall community.

**Examples of unacceptable behavior include:**
* Public or private harassment.
* Publishing others' private information without permission.
* Any conduct that could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.

## Enforcement

Community leaders are responsible for clarifying and enforcing our standards and will take appropriate corrective action in response to any behavior that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

Community leaders have the right to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct.

## Reporting

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported to the community leaders at **mrsoupdev@gmail.com**. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated promptly and fairly.
